title: Voltage vs Current in a simple circuit

content.question: An experiment is performed using a strip of metal. The strip is connected in the circuit shown above, and the potential difference across the strip and the current passing through it are measured. The best-fit line of the data is shown on the graph above. One adjustment will be made to the setup, and the experiment will be repeated. Which of the following best indicates the change and the new best-fit line graph of the data that would result from this change?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
